name: learning
description: A distributed screenshot capture service built with Fastify, BullMQ, and Puppeteer. This system processes screenshot requests using a job queue architecture with Redis for persistence and horizontal worker scaling.

scripts.pm2:start: npm run build && pm2 start ecosystem.config.cjs
scripts.pm2:start:prod: npm run build && pm2 start ecosystem.config.cjs --env production

author: Hitesh Tripathi
